NICOLAS.JOB: Head of Operations at Grupo Independiente
NICOLAS.COMMENT: I worked with Jimmy in the development of the frontend of the Flip Inversiones App, in which integrations had to be made with the backend and various APIs. Jimmy stood out for his quick adaptability to the requested requirements, for the proactivity shown and for his responsibility to meet the agreed deadlines.

MIGUEL.COMMENT: His experience in development and technical support is very good where he fully complies with everything assigned to him. Additionally, their ability to work as a team and communicate effectively was critical to our successes. I firmly believe that you will bring valuable technical skills and a positive approach to the team wherever you are.
